description: This file defines a Python class 'Cerebras' for interacting with the Cerebras API, including methods for creating clients, preparing request parameters, invoking API calls synchronously and asynchronously, streaming responses, and parsing responses into a standardized format.

classes.name: Cerebras
classes.description: A class for interacting with models using the Cerebras API, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous operations, request parameter management, and response parsing.

methods.name: _get_client_params
methods.description: Constructs and returns a dictionary of client parameters, fetching API key from environment if not set.

methods.name: get_client
methods.description: Returns a Cerebras client instance, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: get_async_client
methods.description: Returns an asynchronous Cerebras client instance, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Prepares and returns request parameters, including tools and response format options.

methods.name: invoke
methods.description: Performs a synchronous chat completion request to the Cerebras API.

methods.name: ainvoke
methods.description: Performs an asynchronous chat completion request to the Cerebras API.

methods.name: invoke_stream
methods.description: Streams a chat completion response synchronously.

methods.name: ainvoke_stream
methods.description: Streams a chat completion response asynchronously.

methods.name: _format_message
methods.description: Formats a Message object into the API-compatible message dictionary.

methods.name: parse_provider_response
methods.description: Parses a Cerebras ChatCompletionResponse into a ModelResponse.

methods.name: parse_provider_response_delta
methods.description: Parses a streaming response chunk into a ModelResponse.
